^按F键切换全屏\\s+局内按Esc键暂停游戏\\s+:
<size=10>F = Beralih ke Layar Penuh
ESC = Jeda Permainan
Difficulty 4/5 = Abu-abu tidak lagi mengabaikan armor
Difficulty 4 = Pengurangan DMG 30%
Difficulty 5 = Pengurangan DMG 60%,
-50% Peluang Pesona</size>

^自定义关卡使用条款，开发者在此声明：\\s+:
Ketentuan Penggunaan Level Kustom, Pernyataan Pengembang:
Custom levels are created by players themselves. If a map violates laws or regulations, or infringes on the rights of others, please immediately exit and delete the level. Playing the level implies that the player agrees to bear any risks and responsibilities associated with using custom levels.
^地图编辑器使用条款，开发者在此声明：\\s+:
Ketentuan Penggunaan Editor Peta, Pernyataan Pengembang:
The editor is only for normal level creation use. Any behavior that violates laws and regulations or infringes on the rights of others is strictly prohibited. Players agree to assume the risks and responsibilities associated with using the editor.
^按Tab切换鼠标位置格子类型\\s+:
Tekan Tab untuk beralih tipe grid mouse.
Tahan A atau D untuk menggerakkan mouse dan beralih ke rumput atau tanah.
Tekan C untuk menyimpan; level yang disimpan akan berlaku di level kustom.
^保存关卡完毕！前往自定义关卡游玩\\s+:
Level berhasil disimpan! Pergi bermain custom levels.
Anda juga bisa membagikan level yang Anda buat kepada teman-teman untuk menantang mereka.
Lokasi file level adalah sebagai berikut:
C:\Users[Username Anda]\AppData\LocalLow\LanPiaoPiao\PlantsVsZombiesRH\CustomBlock.json
